champ.champInfo:
5th Kyiv Kyokushinkai Karate Championship in the KATA section

The date of the competition is October 21, 2023.

Kyiv, str. Brativ Tarasivtsiv, 8a

Registration of tournament participants takes place through a personal account on the website https://www.alliance-kumite.net

Phone numbers for preliminary applications: Ihor Tatarchenko - +38(067) 788 77 28;

Competition program

  • 08:00-08:30 registration of participants
  • 08:30-08:45 referee seminar
  • 09:00â€“18:00 start of competition, official opening, line-up of participants
  • 18:00-19:00 end of the competition, awarding of winners and prize-winners, closing of the competition

Competition participants

Qualification groups

Qualification: 0kyu - 9kyu (girls and boys separately)

  • Age category: 2005-2006, 2007-2008, 2009-2010, 2011-2012, 2013-2014, 2015-2016, 2017-2018
  • Kata: taikyoku sono ichi, taikyoku sono ni
  • All athletes will be divided into categories of 4 participants (Olympic system: semi-final - final)
  • Awards: 1st-4th place diploma-medal

Qualification: 8kyu - 7kyu (girls and boys separately)

  • Age category: 2005-2006, 2007-2008, 2009-2010, 2011-2012, 2013-2014, 2015-2016, 2017-2018
  • Kata: taikyoku sono ichi, taikyoku sono ni, taikyoku sono san
  • All athletes will be divided into categories of 4 participants (Olympic system: semi-final - final)
  • Semifinals (taikyoku sono ichi or not at the discretion of the referee) and final or for 3rd place (taikyoku sono san)
  • Awards: 1st-4th place diploma-medal

Qualification: 6kyu and above (girls and boys separately)

  • Age category: 2005-2006, 2007-2008, 2009-2010, 2011-2012, 2013-2014
  • Kata to the quarterfinals: taikyoku sono ichi, taikyoku sono ni, taikyoku sono san
  • Kata quarter-finals, semi-finals and finals: kata of the athlete's choice: pinan sono ichi, ni, san, yon, go
  • Awards: 1st-4th place cup-diploma-medal

Qualification: age category 18+ without taking into account kyu (girls and boys separately)

  • Qualifying rounds: mandatory kata by drawing cards with their referee names - Yantsu, Tsuki-no Kata, Heksai dai, Saiha, Hekusai sho
  • Quarterfinals, Semifinals, 3rd place match, Final: personal choice kata from Garyu, Seichin, Kanku, Seipai, Susiho
  • Awards: 1st-4th place cup-diploma-medal

The categories of group kata will be formed if there is a sufficient number of applications
